name: ntag424-crypto
description: Comprehensive, hardware-agnostic cryptographic library for NTAG424 DNA encryption/decryption operations

scripts.test:quick: node -e "const { quickTest } = require('./test'); const result = quickTest('00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF', 'https://test.com/nfc?picc_data=FDE4AFA99B5C820A2C1BB0F1C792D0EB&cmac=C48B89C17A233B2C'); console.log('Success:', result.success, 'CMAC:', result.cmacValid);"

author: Serdar Tepekule
